task: Develop a basic 'Yahtzee' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Is the tuning appropriate?'.
name: Dice Harmony

branding_data.short_description: Experience a unique twist on the classic dice game 'Yahtzee' with Dice Harmony, where strategic tuning is key.
branding_data.detailed_description: Dice Harmony is an innovative adaptation of the beloved dice game 'Yahtzee', enhanced with a unique strategic twist inspired by the oblique strategy 'Is the tuning appropriate?'. In this version, players must not only roll the dice to achieve high-scoring combinations but also adjust the 'tuning' of their dice. This tuning mechanic allows players to influence the probability of rolling certain numbers, adding a new layer of strategy and decision-making to the game. Players must carefully balance their tuning choices to maximize their scores while adapting to the dynamic flow of the game. With its engaging gameplay and strategic depth, Dice Harmony offers a fresh and challenging experience for fans of dice games.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
